titleStmt.title: A court of judicature in imitation of Libanius. With new epigrams. By the hand that translated Martial.
titleStmt.author: Killigrew, Henry, 1613-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Bonwicke at the Red Lion in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Hand that translated Martial = Henry Killigrew.
